item.description:
HOST: Claire P

cell # 603-247-0897

2012 Windham Rail Trail, Flat N Fast 5K

This event will be held rain or shine. Please join in this fun fundraiser for the upkeep of the Windham Rail Trail. You can either race or walk this 5K path. Race starts at 8:30 am walkers will follow immediately after.

Course: Flat and fast paved point to point shaded picturesque course. Water will be provided at the 2 mile mark. Parking is at the Taylors Bingo Hall 122 N Lowell Rd Windham NH 03087. Free shuttle will be provided to the start line at Roulston Rd Windham. The last bus will leave at 8:10 am. Food and drinks will be provided at the finish line. Please see link below for all of the information. Registration can be sent to PO Box 4317 Windham NH 03087 or the day of the event in the Taylor’s Barn parking lot. The Early bird fee is $20 per person, and a maximum of $70 for a family, day of the event, the fee is $25 per person or $80 for a family.

Please come and show your support of the rail trail that we all enjoy so much!

http://www.windhamrailtrail.org/

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: 2012 Windham Rail Trail Flat N Fast 5K
